Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.powertree

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Build
    Build a block on one of the available cells Contains cellAfterBuild attribute, which is the cell that has been built on during the last turn
    BuildDomePrompt
    manage boolean requests for building a dome
    BuildOnDifferentCell
    Build a second block on one of the available cells, which must be different from the previous built cell
    BuildOnSameCell
    Build a second block on one of the available cells, which must be the same of the previous built cell
    BuildOrMovePrompt
    manage user reply if he wants to build before moving
    DontBuildDome  
    DoubleBuild
    check if a worker is able to build another time ather their previous build.
    DoubleMove
    check if a worker is able to move another time after their previous move.
    FindAvailableCells
    is a prototype of findAvailableCells contains as methods ExecuteMoveLimitation,LoseCondition
    FindAvailableCellsBuild
    Extend FindAvailableCells, override doAction() and compute availableCells for building
    FindAvailableCellsBuildBeforeMove
    extends FindAvailableCellsBuild , override superClass doAction() and compute cells before any type of move
    FindAvailableCellsBuildDifferentCell
    extends FindAvailableCells , override doAction() and compute cells for building a second time but not on the same call as previous build;
    FindAvailableCellsBuildInstantDome
    extends FindAvailableCellsBuild
    FindAvailableCellsBuildSameCell
    extends FindAvailableCellsBuild ,override super.doAction();
    FindAvailableCellsDontMoveBack
    performs the same function as FindAvailableCellsMove,but delete the cell where it was previously, so it cannot go back to where it was before, used for the second move of artemis
    FindAvailableCellsMove
    it is used to create a list with the cells in which the selected worker can move
    FindAvailableCellsMoveButDontMoveUp
    performs the same function as FindAvailableCellsMove but checks that the cells are on the same level as the worker
    FindAvailableCellsMoveOptions
    special case for a god that move after has build
    FindAvailableCellsMovePush  
    FindAvailableCellsMoveSwitch
    used to return the cells to the god (Apollo) who must be able to switch
    FindAvailableCellsSelectOptions
    controls which workers are selectable
    InstantBuildDome
    Instantly builds a dome on one of the available cells, regardless of the cell's current level
    LimitedPower  
    Move
    this class includes the whole family of constructions, that is, all possible types of moves of all gods
    MoveButDontGoBack
    this additional move, called MoveButDontGoBack has this effect: move one additional time, but not back to its initial space it is used by the god Artemis
    MoveCheckingLevel
    this function checks if it is possible to make a move, checking the correctness it is used by all gods
    MovePush
    this additional move, called movePush has this effect: move into an opponent Worker’s space, if their Worker can be forced one space straight backwards to an unoccupied space at any level it is used by the god Minotaur
    MoveSwitch
    this additional move, called MoveSwitch has this effect: move into an opponent Worker’s space by forcing their Worker to the space yours just vacated.
    Power  
    Select
    manages the selection of workers in the selection phase
    SelectThenSkip  
    WinCondition
    get selected worker of the current turn and verify thet win condition is verified : workers level went from Mid to Top and notify win with PlayerWonEvent
    WinIfTwoLevelsDown
    This is Pan's winCondition
